name: COM-559 Assignment 3 Tamagotchi
description:
Univeristy Assignment for Wrexham Glydwr University COM 559

Assignment 3 by:

Ryan Ian Davies

S19002364@mail.glyndwr.ac.uk

A 3rd iteration of my Tamagotchi project from a C++ console interface to a 3D Unreal Engine 4 Project. Created using my knowledge of C++ progamming and Unreal blueprints.
All sprites, logos and 3D models have also been created by myself in Maya and Aseprite. 
This iteration also includes a clickable User Interface that ive created and simple us of public domain sound effects.
